page.title: 13DUDLESTON HALL
page.content: {Dudleston Hall}is a{dairy/mixed farm which is{250 acres in size. They own{125 cows.}These are {Friesians}and can be used for both {dairy cattle}and{beef.}The main thing the farm produces is{milk.}The milking parlour is a{Herring Bone design}and it is designed so that 1 man can milk all the cows single handed. The milk all goes to the{dairy}at{Ellesmere. The average amount of milk per month is about{60,000 litres}but in a good season they can get as much as{70,000 {litres.}The best season is in{autumn. Here are some average amounts per month for April and May: {April-56,790 litres {May -64,242 litres They do not go to market regularly but they do sell their calves there. At the moment the calves fetch about{Â£100 at the market.
